caption: Uniform Resource Locator
name: url
description: The Uniform Resource Locator (URL) object describes the path and reputation of a URL.

categories.description: A list of URL categories as defined by the event source.

hostname.description: The URL host as extracted from the URL. For example: www.example.com.

path.description: The URL path as extracted from the URL. For example: /download/trouble.

provider.description: The provider of the reputation and category information.
